title.rendered: Bangladesh vs England, 1st T20I 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Bangladesh: Najmul Hossain Shanto, Litton Das, Towhid Hridoy, Shakib Al Hasan (c), Shamim Hossain, Afif Hossain, Nurul Hasan (wk), Mehidy Hasan Miraz, Taskin Ahmed, Hasan Mahmud/Nasum Ahmed, Mustafizur Rahman

England: Jos Buttler (c & wk), Philip Salt, Dawid Malan, Ben Duckett, Moeen Ali, Sam Curran, Chris Woakes, Chris Jordan, Jofra Archer, Adil Rashid, Mark Wood

Pitch Report

Venue: Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium, Chattogram

(Based on last three T20Is)

1st innings average score: 156

2nd innings average score: 148

Wickets per innings: 7

Type: Balanced

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Shakib Al Hasan has great T20 numbers at the Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium. He is the leading wicket-taker (29), and has smashed 712 runs at an average of 37 and a stunning strike rate of 149.

Najmul Hossain Shanto was the top run-getter in the recently concluded Bangladesh T20 league: 516 runs at 40.

Taskin Ahmed has scalped 25 wickets at the venue, including a fifer.

Dawid Malan has scored 869 runs at 35 in T20s in Bangladesh, including a century and five fifties.

Litton Das and Afif Hossain have been in top form of late. While Das bludgeoned three thirties and as many fifties in the last 10 T20s, Hossain managed four thirties and two fifties.

Jos Buttler’s T20 numbers in 2023 make great reading. He has hammered 391 runs at 39, including only one single-digit score in 11 innings. With the gloves, he has pouched eight catches and inflicted a stumping.

Mark Wood has been troubling the batters with his pace time and again. He has scalped nine wickets in the last four T20Is, generating the three-wicket bonus twice.

Ben Duckett featured in the Best11 in the last five games, averaging 56 with the bat.

Spinners picked 39% of wickets in the last three T20Is at the venue.
